consumer

Interface ConsumerIF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Consumer

    public interface ConsumerIF
    Specifies an interface to interact with a message server.
    Author:
    Nikolai Seip, Sebastian Mattheis, Fabian Hinz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deregisterFromServer()
      Deregisters this consumer on the server
      java.lang.String getNewBroadcasts()
      When the user wants to read his received broadcasts, he calls this method to get them
      java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getProducers()
      Fetches all available producers
      java.lang.String[] getSubscriptions()
      Fetches a list of all producers this consumer is subscribed to
      boolean hasNewMessages()
      Checks if there are new messages available for this consumer
      boolean isRegistered() 
      boolean registerOnServer()
      Registers this consumer on the server and starts an new thread for receiving messages from the server
      boolean stopReceiving()
      Stops receiving new Broadcasts
      java.lang.String[] subscribeToProducers(java.lang.String[] producers)
      Subscribes this user to the given producers
      java.lang.String[] unsubscribeFromProducers(java.lang.String[] producers)
      Unsubscribes this consumer from the given producers

    • Method Detail

      • registerOnServer

        boolean registerOnServer()
        Registers this consumer on the server and starts an new thread for receiving messages from the server
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, false if not

      • getProducers

        java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getProducers()
        Fetches all available producers
        Returns:
        all available producers, an empty string array if there are none, null if the operation was unsuccessful

      • subscribeToProducers

        java.lang.String[] subscribeToProducers(java.lang.String[] producers)
        Subscribes this user to the given producers
        Parameters:
        producers - The names of the producers
        Returns:
        a list of producers, it wasn't possible to subscribe to

      • getSubscriptions

        java.lang.String[] getSubscriptions()
        Fetches a list of all producers this consumer is subscribed to
        Returns:
        an array of producers this consumer is subscribed to

      • unsubscribeFromProducers

        java.lang.String[] unsubscribeFromProducers(java.lang.String[] producers)
        Unsubscribes this consumer from the given producers
        Parameters:
        producers - The names of the producers
        Returns:
        a list of producers, it was not possible to unsubscribe from

      • deregisterFromServer

        boolean deregisterFromServer()
        Deregisters this consumer on the server
        Returns:
        if the operation was successful

      • isRegistered

        boolean isRegistered()
        Returns:
        if this consumer is registered on the server

      • getNewBroadcasts

        java.lang.String getNewBroadcasts()
        When the user wants to read his received broadcasts, he calls this method to get them
        Returns:
        a String with all of the broadcasts

      • stopReceiving

        boolean stopReceiving()
        Stops receiving new Broadcasts
        Returns:
        true if the receiving has stopped, false if the receiving has already been stopped

      • hasNewMessages

        boolean hasNewMessages()
        Checks if there are new messages available for this consumer
        Returns:
        true if there are new messages available for this consumer, false if not
